headline: 2026’s Biggest AI Trends: Self-Driving Cars | TSLA Stock, GOOGL Stock, UBER Stock, NVDA Stock

In this video, Eric and Austin focus on recent developments in self-driving cars. Specifically, NVIDIA just launched its new Alpamayo suite of self-driving models. headline: Proposed billionaires' tax in California rattles Silicon Valley, entangles Gov. Newsom

Nearly half its personal income tax revenue, a financial backbone in the nearly $350 billion budget, comes from the top 1% of earners.
